mapper.select: SELECT ab.*, IF(aus.is_default_board IS NULL, 0, 1) AS user_default, IF(aus2.swimlane_based_code is null ,'swimlane_none',aus2.swimlane_based_code) as userDefaultBoard FROM agile_board ab LEFT JOIN agile_user_setting aus ON ab.board_id = aus.board_id AND aus.project_id = ab.project_id AND aus.type_code = 'board' and aus.user_id = #{userId} and is_default_board = 1 left join agile_user_setting aus2 on ab.board_id = aus2.board_id and aus2.project_id = ab.project_id and aus2.type_code = 'board' and aus2.user_id = #{userId} WHERE ab.project_id = #{projectId}
